author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Tips for tile shower niche back wall…I use my laser to match the tile height and grout joints from the main wall. The first row has a 1/16 inch expansion joint between the sill and 1/8 inch expansion joint between the Schluter niche. I set the sill first then the back wall followed by the top and sides 🔥 #tileshower #tileniche #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: Tips for Tile Shower Niche Back Wall - #shorts #tileshower #homerepairtutor
